concept.title: Joining a Sametime meeting
concept.shortdesc: This section discusses the steps on how to join the two types of meetings.

section.title: About instant meetings
section.p: Anyone with the meeting link can join. In an instant meeting, there are no moderators and all users have the following capabilities.

ul.li: Toggle meeting views and view participants
View or change selected user settings

section.p: Additionally, authenticated users have the following capabilities. For more information, refer to the section.

ul.li: Chat through the embedded or standalone Sametime client

Control all other users
Lower hands
Mute all
Disable cameras
Kick out participants

section.title: About moderated meetings
section.p: This type of meeting limits control to the owner or designated moderators. For more information on the basic features, refer to . To use all the meeting features, try . Depending on the access level and how the meeting is configured, you are either redirected to the waiting room or are admitted to the meeting after joining. For more information, refer to . If you are unable to join a meeting, contact the moderator for assistance.
